item.title: Focus On What Matters: Separated Models For Visual-Based RL Generalization
item.description: SMG (Separated Models for Generalization) enhances visual RL generalization by disentangling task-relevant and irrelevant visual features via cooperative reconstruction, achieving state-of-the-art per…
